issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement regexp_matches, regexp_like functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7205](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7205). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support following signature in Gandiva:
FunctionSignature\{name =regexp_matches, return type =Bool, param types =[Utf8, Utf8]}

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7205?focusedCommentId=17244632) by Will Jones (willjones127):*
I'm interesting in finishing this with a PR.

`[~projjal]` was this closed because you thought it was no longer needed, or just didn't have time to finish?
